data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: This is the first time that Harry and Voldemort actually duel. Before ____, ____ disembodied Voldemort had ____ others ____ fight ____ him. Also, Voldemort ____, ____, ____ more ____ with ____ wand ____ is ____ here. Dumbledore states later in the novel that more victims would have appeared had the connection between the wands been held for longer.
data.partBlankContent: This is the first time that Harry and Voldemort actually duel. Before th__, t__ disembodied Voldemort had ord____ others t_ fight f__ him. Also, Voldemort h__, presu_____, kil___ more peo___ with h__ wand th__ is sh___ here. Dumbledore states later in the novel that more victims would have appeared had the connection between the wands been held for longer.
data.answer: 这是哈利和伏地魔第一次真正的决斗。在此之前，没有躯体的伏地魔曾命令其他人为他而战。而且，伏地魔用他的魔杖杀死的人大概比这里显示的要多。邓布利多在小说的后面说，如果魔杖之间的联系被握得更久，会有更多的受害者出现。
